00126         if( (pts[i] > 0.0) &&
00127             (pts[i+1] > 0.0)  
00128             && (pts[i+2] > 0.0) &&
00129             ( (static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i]*(static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)))) < (1u<<maxDepth))  &&
00130             ( (static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i+1]*(static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)))) < (1u<<maxDepth))  &&
00131             ( (static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i+2]*(static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)))) < (1u<<maxDepth)) ) {
00132           tmpNodes.push_back( ot::TreeNode(
00133                 static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i]*static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)),
00134                 static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i+1]*static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)),

00213     }
